metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18201 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GNU libcdio before 2.0.0. There is a double freein get_cdtext_generic() in lib/driver/_cdio_generic.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcdio++1 - 2.0.0-2
libcdio-utils - 2.0.0-2
libcdio19 - 2.0.0-2
libiso9660++0 - 2.0.0-2
libiso9660-11 - 2.0.0-2
libudf0 - 2.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcdio package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-2').
